attributes.action: Government & House of Commons, please stop quibbling and pursue leaving the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The result of the referendum and open dissent being expressed, by elected members, particularly to the BBC. This is damaging to our country. Past rivalries should be put aside in the national interest.
attributes.background: After months of argument and debate, the public have indicated, by the result of the Referendum, that we should leave the EU. At present we are hearing continual dissent from Ministers and MPs. That should stop and you should unite to enact withdrawal from the EU on the best possible terms.
